issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Runtime Error intermittently occurs when tap on 'Run Query' button or back button on a device.

It is not a regression it occurs in 2.1.1.GA

Steps to reproduce:
1) Launch refactored Kitchen Sink (Kevin Winnerey/Developer relations version) > Mashups > Facebook > Query
2) Login to Facebook using test id
3) Tap on 'Run Query' button
4) Tap on back button on a device
5) Leave device for some time (approximately 2 min)
6) Tap on 'Run Query' button or back button on a device

Actual result:
Runtime Error occurs

Expected result:
Application works without Runtime Error
fields.summary: Android: KS: Facebook>Query -v8: Runtime Error occurs intermittently (on 2.2.x devices)
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208201549
SDK version: 2.1.1.GA and 2.1.2.v20120821160113
Device:
Motorola Droid (2.2.3)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
